data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Montevideo, Uruguay to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Montevideo, Uruguay
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Montevideo, Uruguay.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Montevideo, Uruguay.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Montevideo to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Montevideo
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Montevideo, Montevideo, Uruguay.
Lord, please give the 96,235 believers in the state of Montevideo the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 1,222,965 people in Montevideo who are far from you. Please add 263 new house churches this year.

data.section_summary:
the state of Montevideo, Uruguay has a population of 1,319,200.

We estimate Montevideo has 96,235 people who might know Jesus, 781,369 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 441,596 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Montevideo. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.
